name: block.one
goal: Block.one is the global leader in high performance Blockchain software. It is the creator of the open source EOSIO software, designed for high performance blockchains. We aim to create a blockchain ecosystem of applications that can replace existing models of digital commerce and communications.
interests: Digital economy and society, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives: Main EU initiatives, policies and legislative files followed by the organization:  block.one is following the International Association for Trusted Blockchain Applications and the European Blockchain Observatory and Forum.
